activities.name: Copy ecdc data to Data lake

ifTrueActivities.name: Delete src file after the load

scriptLines: selectRequiredFields2 split(indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
